title: Build Health & Bundle Size Regression Baseline
scope: npm run build output — esbuild bundling, warning catalog, size baseline

details.message: Node's package format requires that CommonJS files in a 'type: module' package use the .cjs file extension
details.impact: None — esbuild handles CJS/ESM interop automatically

details.message: The glob pattern import('./**/*.js') did not match any files
details.impact: SourceCatalogAggregator dynamic imports don't resolve at build time — runtime-only pattern

2 build warnings (CJS/ESM interop + empty glob) are cosmetic and have no functional impact
Regression baseline established: 6.6MB / 1025ms / 0 TS errors / 1115 tests
